channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- BlackBerry UEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- BlackBerry UEM

item.title: CVE-2018-8891|2024-08-05T07:10:46.960Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: Multiple stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.9.1 could allow an attacker to store script commands that could later be executed in the context of another Management Console administrator.

item.title: CVE-2018-8888|2024-08-05T07:10:46.639Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.10.0 could allow an attacker to store script commands that could later be executed in the context of another Management Console administrator.

item.title: CVE-2018-8892|2024-08-05T07:10:46.755Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.9.1 could allow an attacker to make modifications to the UEM settings in the context of a Management Console administrator.
